name: Hampton Inn & Suites Frederick-Fort Detrick

reviews.text: The front desk staff was outstanding. The room had a great layout with suite-like features in the king room. Location was perfect for us, attending an event in Thurmont. Convenient to 15 although getting to the hotel a bit tricky. Usual Hampton hot breakfast - very clean, comfortable area. All-around good stay.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: Every staff member was extremely courteous; rooms especially clean and comfortable; breakfast excellent, with many options, good access and parking
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.text: I was an attending an intensive training course that was being held at this hotel so I wanted the convenience of staying "on-site". Otherwise, Hampton Inn's generally aren't my first choice. I may have to reconsider that now because this place was great. Upon entering the hotel I thought it was a brand new property. Apparently the hotel was renovated a few months ago and it really shows. The common area and the rooms are all done really nice and have granite and other nice finishes I don't normally associate with Hampton Inn. On top of that, every hotel guest I encountered was very friendly and went out of their way for the guests. This property is obviously very well managed. I would categorize this as a 4-star hotel and it honestly was nicer than many high-end hotels I have stayed at in the past. I will stay here any time I am in the Fredericksburg area.
reviews.title: Really Impressed!

reviews.text: I stayed at this property for three nights and really enjoyed my stay. Arturo and Laura at the Front Desk were extremely helpful and personable. The lobby has recently been redone and the rooms are nicely appointed.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable Hotel With Friendly Service

reviews.text: The location is very convenient to the highway and to Frederick.
reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Nice Rooms, Really Quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night so that we wouldn't need to drive back to DC after dinner at Volt. The last time we stayed at one of the b&bs in town and it just wasn't worth it. This was a good experience. Friendly staff, nice room, impressive breakfast (individual omelets, fresh fruit, etc.). We paid $87 for the night and it was worth the money.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in Frederick

reviews.text: Tip for those looking for a hotel near Volt, this was about 2 miles away. Roundtrip cabfare was $20 with tip.
reviews.title: A home from home

reviews.text: I stayed at the Hampton Inn and Suites for 2 weeks as I was working at Fort Detrick.
reviews.title: Standard Fare

reviews.text: Pros
reviews.title: Bring your swimsuit!

reviews.text: 1. Free fruit, tea, coffee, hot chocolate etc all day everyday
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I picked this hotel because of the location to an appointment we had... clean, basic hotel, considering the breakfast was included, it was a good deal. Friendly staff.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great location

reviews.text: This hotel is very clean, the staff is professional, decor is simple but pleasant. A pretty nice breakfast is included in your stay-waffles, eggs, etc. Rooms very neat as well; housekeeping is really on the ball. The upgraded bedding rooms, I think they call them "Cloud Nine" beds are great, best nights of sleep I've had in awhile. Another great thing- there were several events going on and tons of people staying at the hotel, but I never heard a peep once I was in my room.
reviews.title: Spotless hotel,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is close to the downtown area, tons of restaurants and bars within 5 minutes.
reviews.title: Room was nice, breakfast and service were lacking

reviews.text: I visited the hotel on business so I didn't foot the bill, however I saw what it was, and in my opinion it was SLIGHTLY on the high side for the area. I do think it was worth it though, and I would certainly return, even at that rate.
reviews.title: Great Hampton Inn

reviews.text: We stayed here for a few nights in order to attend an event nearby in Frederick. The location of this hotel was very near the event, and someone else recommended the hotel to us, so we selected it over other similarly priced hotels. It was OK but not as good as some of the other Hampton Inns at which I've stayed. The room was nice enough and had a large fridge. The location is also convenient to a grocery and some fast food places although you have to make some maneuvers across a busy road to get to them. Although it's not super close to downtown Frederick, a short drive will get you there.
reviews.title: Brand New - Perfect Hotel.

reviews.text: Just returned from a wonderful 4 night stay at The Hampton Inn. The tone was set at check in by the desk clerk and the service continued to be fantastic throughout the stay. Staff was welcoming, courteous, and responsive to questions and needs. I experienced a maintence issue and it was taken care of right away. Hotel was very clean. Easily accessible from main roads. Would stay there again without hesitation.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.text: Search Reviews Recent Reviews1 Review
reviews.title: Very nice hotel and staff

reviews.title: Most unprofessional management I have ever encountered

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Frederick, MD 21702
reviews.title: We'd stay here again

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Frederick-Fort Detrick Hotel
description: With an ideal location in Maryland’s second largest city, the Frederick-Fort Detrick offers easy access to Fort Detrick along with all the other attractions of the city. Whether you prefer to take in the historical sites or stroll through the town, browsing antiques, this hotel is conveniently positioned for both business and leisure travel. And during your stay, enjoy a free, hot breakfast each morning, complimentary internet service, free parking, an indoor pool, fitness center and more.
